Santa Claus:
Happy New Year 2019!!!
I have prepared a lot of gifts and am ready to distribute them to all the guys who behaved well in the outgoing year! Just take a look at this heavy gift bag!
However, those who will not hunt will receive nothing! Like this! And if you bring me Snowy Squash Nectar, I will exchange it for Snowy Squash Seed or Large Snowy Squash Seed.
All roads are covered up, somehow got to Elmoraden! Meet the dear guest!
The event will last from December 4th until January 15th. Nectar falls until January 10 (10:00 Moscow time). From 18:00 to 02:00 falls three times more nectar. On January 15, the following items will be deleted:
- Mango Juice - Cherry Juice - Strawberry Juice - Snowy Squash Nectar - Snowy Squash Seed - Large Snowy Squash Seed Also remove the effect of the Winter Holiday Festival. Souvenir weapons will remain in memory.
